section.title: How to refer resources from the WebHelp template pages

draft-comment.author: webapp
draft-comment.b: What happens with resources referenced by a template?

section.p: When you develop a Webhelp template you can refer the next resource categories:

li.p: Resources that are part of the template
A template can have specific resources like images or CSS files that can be accessed using the {$oxygen-webhelp-template-dir} macro.
Resources that are shared by all templates

The oxygen-webhelpfolder contains resources that will be copied in the WebHelp output and that could be shared by all templates. A such sample resource is the JQuery library. To access a such resource you should use the macro {$oxygen-webhelp-resources}.
